item.title: Back in the Saddle
item.author: Author
item.description: Where I’ve been After a long haiatus, I am back in the world of MySQL and infrastructure. I spent over 10 years at Percona, first as a MySQL Consultant, then as a manager, then as an IT doer of things, finally as the Director of IT. Earlier this year I made the decision to return to an individual contributor status at a new company, Block, or more specifically, Square. What I’m doing now No doubt some old-timers will remember my blogs at Percona, mostly about PXC and Galera.
